text: int main ( ) { int n = 0 ; int i = 0 ; int j = 0 ; int k ; scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; while ( k -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i + 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( i > 0 && j > 0 && j != i ) { a [ i ] [ j ] += ( a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] >= a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ) ? a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] : a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; } else if ( i != 0 ) { if ( j == 0 ) { a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } else if ( j == i ) a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; } } int max = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( max < a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ) max = a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ; } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
